Title: Halter Beaded Top Prom Dress

----

Sku: CK19

Colors: navy

Category: evening

Featured-image: CK19-navy-halter-beaded-top-prom-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: The halter top of the gown is detailed with beading in circular patterns. The back of the bodice is a razor back style with open shoulder and back. The straps are beaded with the same detailing. The A-line dress has a pleated chiffon skirt that falls to the floor.
